name: PixelFem #29 - Maria Aleskeevna Ermolova
description:
Maria was the first female firefighter in the Russian Empire. Here she is, pictured in St. Petersburg in 1910, with her trusty fire engine and dog. She was a lady-in-waiting at the Imperial Court and dedicated herself to the organization of firefighter teams in St.Peterburg, Riga and rural regions of Ryazan region (her home places).

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
